DOC.brief_summary: Persons with COPD are randomized to pedometer versus pedometer plus Internet mediated website to promote walking and physical activity. Primary outcome is daily step counts. Intervention lasts 3 months.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Internet Mediated Walking Program and Pedometer in COPD
DOC.criteria: COPD, ability to walk, has Internet access COPD exacerbation in previous 4 weeks
